dcterms:creator: Martin Potthast
Johannes Kiesel
Kevin Reinartz
Janek Bevendorff
Benno Stein
dcterms:description: The by-publisher corpus contains 750K articles which were automatically classified based on a categorization of the political bias of the news source. This dataset was split into a training set of 600K articles and a validation set of 150K articles, where all the articles in the validation set originated from sources not in the training set.
dcterms:title: By-Publisher Corpus

dcterms:creator: Martin Potthast
Johannes Kiesel
Kevin Reinartz
Janek Bevendorff
Benno Stein
dcterms:description: The by-article corpus contains 645 articles which were labelled manually.
dcterms:title: By-Article Corpus

dcterms:creator: Martin Potthast
Johannes Kiesel
Kevin Reinartz
Janek Bevendorff
Benno Stein
dcterms:description: A dataset of 628 articles which were also labeled manually for the final evaluation.
dcterms:title: Dataset of 628 articles
